name: The Adventures of PhiotaMan
description:
"The Oldest Existing Latino Fraternity is attacked by three other rival fraternities, and your Crest emblem is STOLEN.

After breaking it apart into three different pieces, PHIOTA MAN must go back and claim the power that is rightfully his!"

Features:

Chuck Platanos at your enemies and blow'em sky high!

Battle the other three fraternity mascots in this crazy three stage game.
